ingredients: ½ pound extra lean ground beef or turkey, see healthy benefits
¼ cup bread crumbs or Panko crumbs
½ cup onion, shredded or minced (about 1 small onion)
1 egg, I like Egg-land’s Best, see healthy benefits
10 cups Swanson’s reduced-sodium chicken broth or your favorite
1 (15 oz) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed, see shopping tip
12 ounces baby spinach, washed and trimmed
